After throwing [[Prayer Beads|prayer beads]] on the sealed victim, [[Chūkaku]] begins to mumble words while performing ritual hand movements, leading the seal formula to slowly disappear. This technique seems to take concentration and strength since Chūkaku looked troubled while performing it.

[[pt-br:Etiqueta de Selamento: Liberar]]
[[pl:Technika Uwolnienia Zapieczętowania]]
